dcterms:creator: Kohei Hara
Koji Inoue
Katsuya Takanashi
Tatsuya Kawahara
dcterms:description: A large-scale annotated corpus for turn-taking with over 5,000 real human-robot dialogues in speech and text modalities, covering both endpointing and barge-in situations.
dcterms:title: Human-Robot Dialogue Corpus

dcterms:creator: Kohei Hara
Koji Inoue
Katsuya Takanashi
Tatsuya Kawahara
dcterms:description: A dataset used for turn-taking prediction based on the detection of transition relevance places, focusing on endpointing scenarios.
dcterms:title: Endpointing Dataset

dcterms:creator: Kohei Hara
Koji Inoue
Katsuya Takanashi
Tatsuya Kawahara
dcterms:description: A dataset used for turn-taking prediction based on the detection of transition relevance places, focusing on barge-in scenarios.
dcterms:title: Barge-in Dataset
